WorkflowInfo.Name: Set service credentials
WorkflowInfo.Description: Set service credentials on a list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process sets a service logon credentials on a list of servers.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SetServiceLogonCredentials;Assembly=SetServiceLogonCredentials, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:SetServiceLogonCredentials Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Set Service Logon Credentials" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" SRVInteract="0" ServiceName="Spooler" TypeName="SetServiceLogonCredentials" SRVType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="setServiceLogonCredentials1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" Description="Sets the service logon credentials." SRVUserName="LocalSystem" SRVPassword="" SRVDomain="" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
